column1: * 2005 - Reading The Lord of the Rings is published.
** The Fellowship of the Ring leaves Rivendell at dusk.
J.R.R. Tolkien noted in Guide to the Names in The Lord of the Rings that the date the Fellowship departed from Rivendell was purposefully chosen.
